page.title: 19NEWS EVENTS CUCKFIELD 1985
page.content: { Warden Park School,}Cuckfield have reached the National Schools athletics cup for the 4th successive year. The Intermediate Girls team won the Sussex round; then finished second in the Regional final to gain a place in the National Finals at Wigan. Cuckfield Rovers under 13 Football team have just returned from playing in the south of France against under 14 squads from France and W.Germany. They won the fair play trophy and finished 5th in their group. Court Meadow special School, Cuckfield has a new adventure playground. The equipment cost Â£5000 and was raised entirely by the public and parents. It is a Modular System Design and has been chosen to provide Stimulation/Fun for the schools mentally handicapped children whose ages range from nursery to teenage.
